entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:43 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
